configuration.name: p4-fusion
configuration.PROGRAM_PARAMS: --path //source/sourcegraph/... --client '' --user admin --src "$ProjectFileDir$/verify/gitout" --networkThreads 64 --port ssl:perforce.sgdev.org:1666 --lookAhead 15000 --printBatch 1000 --noBaseCommit true --retries 10 --refresh 1000 --maxChanges -1 --includeBinaries true --fsyncEnable true --noColor true --flushRate 40
